choose.when: WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna (num, writer, title, content, viewCount, regdate, users_num, space_num) VALUES (qna_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{viewCount}, SYSDATE, #{users_num}, #{space_num})
mapper.select: SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT num,writer,title,content,viewCount,TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS regdate, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) qnaPrevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) qnaNextNum FROM qna) result1 WHERE num=#{num}
